sub_title: Co-Owner and CEO at Access Technology Group  and CEO Visics ATG India ltd (VISICS) and Director Visics Pty Ltd Australia
summary:
More than 20 years experience in Telecommunications and Internet Industry. Worked for IBM, KPN, Ericsson and Imtech. University degree in Business Economics. Enterpreneur since 2002. Proven track record in Vendor Finance industry financing technology companies. Founder of Access Communications a company that succesfully provides triple play services to the business market which is now incorporated in Access Technology Group. A group of companies with focus on digital solutions for turnarounds in the energy sector, wireless communication solutions and high end video and access solutions

Specialties: 
Business Strategy
Sales and account management
Telecom and IT industry
Vendor Financing
Business Economics
International contracting
Mergers and Acquisition
